.table baseEdge
----

edge{from: F, to: T} :-
  baseEdge{from: F, to: T} |
  baseEdge{from: F, to: I} & edge{from: I, to: T}.
----

.rulegraph
----
digraph G {
  "0" [label="0: Union" shape="box"];
  "1" [label="1: Match(baseEdge{from: F, to: T}; {})" shape="box"];
  "2" [label="2: Match(edge{from: I, to: T}; {F: I, T: T})" shape="box"];
  "3" [label="3: Match(baseEdge{from: F, to: I}; {})" shape="box"];
  "4" [label="4: Join(3 & 2)" shape="box"];
  "baseEdge" [label="baseEdge: Base" shape="box"];
  "edge" [label="edge: Subst(edge{from: F, to: T})" shape="box"];
  "0" -> "edge" [];
  "1" -> "0" [];
  "2" -> "4" [];
  "3" -> "4" [];
  "4" -> "0" [];
  "baseEdge" -> "1" [];
  "baseEdge" -> "3" [];
  "edge" -> "2" []
}

baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}.
----
baseEdge: [baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {}]
1: [baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}]
3: [baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", I: "B"}]
0: [baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}]
4: []
edge: [edge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}]
2: [edge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {I: "A", T: "B"}]
4: []

baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}.
----
baseEdge: [baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {}]
1: [baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}]
3: [baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", I: "D"}]
0: [baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}]
4: []
edge: [edge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}]
2: [edge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {I: "C", T: "D"}]
4: []

baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}.
----
baseEdge: [baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {}]
1: [baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}]
3: [baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", I: "C"}]
0: [baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}]
4: [baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}]
edge: [edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}]
0: [baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}]
2: [edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {I: "B", T: "C"}]
edge: [edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}]
4: [edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}]
2: [edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {I: "B", T: "D"}]
0: [edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}]
4: [edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}]
edge: [edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}]
0: [edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}]
2: [edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {I: "A", T: "C"}]
edge: [edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}]
4: []
2: [edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {I: "A", T: "D"}]
4: []
